title: League client won't open!

replies.body:
This often happens if League is missing certain administrative privileges that it relies on to run properly. I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I tried them, the same problem still occurs. :(
What's funny though, is that the alpha client works for me.

In that case, keep using the Alpha Client while you reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend running a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before attaching them to your ticket so we have additional context.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I fixed it, apparently all I needed to do was just run it as administrator.
